entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, York Factory
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 25. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
